text: Pogonocherus pilosipes is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Maurice Pic in 1907. It is known from China.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus pilosipes. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1907
title: Pogonocherus pilosipes
